solution_line_template: Before giving her coworker some coins there were {coins_hour_1}+{coins_hour_2}+{coins_hour_3}+{coins_hour_4}=<<{coins_hour_1}+{coins_hour_2}+{coins_hour_3}+{coins_hour_4}={total_coins_before_giving}>>{total_coins_before_giving} coins

The number of coins after given {coins_given_to_coworker} to her coworker is {total_coins_before_giving}-{coins_given_to_coworker}=<<{total_coins_before_giving}-{coins_given_to_coworker}={final_coins}>>{final_coins}
